price: A onima koji ne vjeruju u Gospodara svoga, pripada patnja u Džehennemu. Užasno je to boravište!
arabic: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walilladhīna kafarū birabbihim ʿadhābu jahannama wabi'sa al-maṣīru
